name: Pen Pals (Seth Konoza)
description:
Connect with new friends using the age-old method of writing pen pal letters.

The game is broken down into very simple mini-games:

  1. Writing the letters
  2. Sending the letters

To write the letters, simply hover your mouse over the character to make him write. As you write, your letter progression will go up and your ink level will go down. To refill ink, simply stop writing by moving your mouse away from the character. Your green energy bar will always go down but can be replenished once per day by clicking on the tea next to the character. When your energy is depleted it is time to move to the next step: sending your letters

You have 6 different friends you can send letters to. The more letters you send, the quicker your friendships will increase. Select how many letters you want to send to a friend and click on the "Send" button. Last thing you need to do is place a stamp on the envelope. The cleaner the stamp placement, the more points you will get towards your friendship.

Just to add a little challenge: 

  1. As your energy goes down, the more ink you will use when writing a letter, depleting your ink quicker.
  2. Each day, you will lose a small amount of friendship points.

See how many days it takes you to fill all of your friendship meters
